MemberSignature.Value: public void GetObjectParam (string pszKey, out object ppunk);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetObjectParam(string pszKey, object ppunk) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the object to search for.
On successful return, the object interface pointer.
Docs.summary: Lookup the given key in the internally-maintained table of contextual object parameters and return the corresponding object, if one exists.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterObjectBound (object punk);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterObjectBound(object punk) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to register for release.
Docs.summary: Register the passed object as one of the objects that has been bound during a moniker operation and which should be released when it is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::RegisterObjectBound` in the MSDN library.
